H0.text: which apostle spoke at the council of jerusalem. Peter

H1.text: which apostle spoke at the council of jerusalem. James

H2.text: which apostle spoke at the council of jerusalem. Barnabas

H3.text: which apostle spoke at the council of jerusalem. Paul

A4.text: James was the last named figure to speak, after Peter, Paul, and Barnabas.

A5.text: James delivered what he called his 'decision' (Acts 15:13-21).

A6.text: James answered, saying, 'Men and brethren, listen to me:'

A7.text: The council listened to James because he was the first of the three pillars of church.
